actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish as a standing committee of the House the Committee on Energy.

summary.text: Establishes as a standing committee of the House the Committee on Energy. States that the Committee on Energy shall conduct investigations and studies into the development, application, use, and control of all forms of energy and power and shall report to the House the results of each investigation and study, together with such recommendations an the committee considers advisable.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish as a standing committee of the House the Committee on Energy.
